name: pepperminty-wiki
description: Pepperminty Wiki is a single-file wiki engine written in PHP designed for easy self-hosting. It supports Markdown content, version control, and customizable themes in a lightweight package.
features: Single-File Deployment: Entire wiki engine contained in one PHP file for extremely simple installation and portability.
Markdown Support: Write wiki pages in Markdown with syntax highlighting and live preview for easy content creation.
Version Control: Track page changes over time with built-in version history and the ability to restore previous revisions.
Search Functionality: Full-text search across all wiki pages to quickly find information regardless of page structure.
Custom Themes: Personalize wiki appearance with customizable CSS themes and layout options.
File Uploads: Attach images and files to wiki pages for embedded media and downloadable resources.
User Management: Optional authentication system with user accounts and permissions for controlled editing access.
Lightweight Design: Minimal resource requirements make it suitable for shared hosting or low-power servers.
Export Options: Download wiki content in various formats for backup or migration to other platforms.
Module System: Extend functionality with optional modules for features like comments, statistics, and advanced search.
Page Linking: Create internal wiki links automatically with simple syntax for building interconnected knowledge bases.
Recent Changes: Track all wiki activity with a chronological feed of edits, new pages, and user contributions.
